data.lyric:
[ti:One Number Away]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:This One's for You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Number Away - Luke Combs
[00:07.69]Written by：Luke Combs/Sammy Mitchell/Robert Williford/Carlos Battey/Steven Battey
[00:15.39]Are you sitting at home all alone
[00:18.01]Trying to fall asleep
[00:19.36]
[00:22.03]Are you staring a hole through your phone
[00:24.56]Praying that it rings
[00:26.28]
[00:28.69]Are you watching a movie
[00:30.50]That you've seen a thousand times
[00:32.87]
[00:35.27]Or maybe playing some Mayer
[00:37.26]Get lost in your favorite lines
[00:39.54]
[00:40.70]Well if you're anything like me
[00:43.35]You just might be doing whatever it takes
[00:46.96]To drown out the noise
[00:49.54]
[00:50.70]But I just wanna hear your voice
[00:53.07]
[00:54.24]And I'm one number away
[00:56.17]From calling to you
[00:57.32]I said I was through
[00:58.33]But I'm dying inside
[01:01.40]Got my head in a mess
[01:02.83]Girl I confess
[01:04.00]I lied when I said
[01:05.19]I'm leaving and not coming back
[01:08.60]Might be the whiskey or the midnight rain
[01:11.13]
[01:11.90]But everywhere I go I see your face
[01:14.46]
[01:15.04]In my brain dial it up everything I wanna say
[01:19.04]
[01:19.62]But I'm still one number away
[01:22.35]
[01:28.74]Are you stuck at a red light
[01:30.65]With a Marlboro Light on your lips
[01:32.88]
[01:35.36]Does the smoke in your mirror
[01:37.13]Get clearer without my kiss
[01:39.57]
[01:42.06]Are you changing the station
[01:43.87]Replacing our favorite songs
[01:46.16]
[01:48.72]Maybe it's a mistake hit the brakes
[01:51.18]I'm moving on
[01:53.12]
[01:54.08]Well if you're anything like me
[01:56.60]You just might be doing whatever it takes
[02:00.36]To outrun the storm
[02:02.93]
[02:03.92]But I'm almost out that door
[02:06.58]
[02:07.29]And I'm one number away
[02:09.45]From calling to you
[02:10.63]I said I was through
[02:11.90]But I'm dying inside
[02:14.73]Got my head in a mess
[02:16.13]Girl I confess
[02:17.28]I lied when I said
[02:18.61]I'm leaving and not coming back
[02:21.96]Might be the whiskey or the midnight rain
[02:24.51]
[02:25.20]But everywhere I go I see your face
[02:28.12]In my brain dial it up everything I wanna say
[02:32.32]
[02:33.00]But I'm still one number away
[02:36.05]Will you pick when I call
[02:39.01]Or just forget we loved at all
[02:42.41]We don't have to talk
[02:44.01]I just wanna hear your voice
[02:46.43]
[02:47.45]And I'm one number away
[02:49.42]From calling to you
[02:50.63]I said I was through
[02:51.92]But I'm dying inside
[02:54.60]Got my head in a mess
[02:56.16]Girl I confess
[02:57.38]I lied when I said
[02:58.68]I'm leaving and not coming back
[03:01.97]Might be the whiskey or the midnight rain
[03:04.58]
[03:05.18]But everywhere I go I see your face
[03:07.81]
[03:08.34]In my brain dial it up everything I wanna say
[03:11.93]
[03:13.01]But I'm still one number away
[03:16.05]
[03:18.14]Away away
[03:23.06]
[03:26.45]Yeah I'm still one number away
data.trans:
[ti:One Number Away]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:This One's for You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.69]//
[00:15.39]你是否孤身一人 无所事事
[00:18.01]辗转反侧 难以入眠
[00:19.36]
[00:22.03]你是否一直在盯着手机
[00:24.56]祈祷电话铃声响起
[00:26.28]
[00:28.69]你是否在看
[00:30.50]那部你已看过无数次的电影
[00:32.87]
[00:35.27]也许在播放米高梅的影片
[00:37.26]沉浸在你最爱的片段
[00:39.54]
[00:40.70]如果你和我一样
[00:43.35]你可能会不惜一切代价
[00:46.96]让所有喧嚣一扫而去
[00:49.54]
[00:50.70]但我只想听听你的声音
[00:53.07]
[00:54.24]当我拨打你的号码
[00:56.17]只是一串空号而已
[00:57.32]我说 我拨打了你的电话
[00:58.33]但我心如死灰
[01:01.40]脑海混乱不堪
[01:02.83]女孩 我承认
[01:04.00]我说了谎话
[01:05.19]我要离你而去 不再回心转意
[01:08.60]也许只有酒精和夜雨可以让我暂时麻痹
[01:11.13]
[01:11.90]但无论我走到哪里 脑海里满满全是你
[01:14.46]
[01:15.04]我多想拨通你的电话 倾诉我的一切想法
[01:19.04]
[01:19.62]但我拨打的仍是一串空号
[01:22.35]
[01:28.74]你是否陷入困境 止步不前
[01:30.65]用香烟压抑内心的忧愁
[01:32.88]
[01:35.36]没有我的亲吻安抚
[01:37.13]你是否愁上加愁
[01:39.57]
[01:42.06]你是否不会再为我停留
[01:43.87]是否早已换掉了我们最爱的歌曲
[01:46.16]
[01:48.72]也许停下脚步是一个错误
[01:51.18]我要继续向前
[01:53.12]
[01:54.08]如果你和我一样
[01:56.60]你可能会不惜一切代价
[02:00.36]在暴风雨中脱身而出
[02:02.93]
[02:03.92]但我几乎无路可退
[02:06.58]
[02:07.29]当我拨打你的号码
[02:09.45]只是一串空号而已
[02:10.63]我说 我拨打了你的电话
[02:11.90]但我心如死灰
[02:14.73]脑海混乱不堪
[02:16.13]女孩 我承认
[02:17.28]我说了谎话
[02:18.61]我要离你而去 不再回心转意
[02:21.96]也许只有酒精和夜雨可以让我暂时麻痹
[02:24.51]
[02:25.20]但无论我走到哪里 脑海里满满全是你
[02:28.12]我多想拨通你的电话 倾诉我的一切想法
[02:32.32]
[02:33.00]但我拨打的仍是一串空号
[02:36.05]你会接听我的电话
[02:39.01]还是会忘记我们曾经相爱的点点滴滴
[02:42.41]我们不需要互诉衷肠
[02:44.01]我只想听听你的声音
[02:46.43]
[02:47.45]当我拨打你的号码
[02:49.42]只是一串空号而已
[02:50.63]我说 我拨打了你的电话
[02:51.92]但我心如死灰
[02:54.60]脑海混乱不堪
[02:56.16]女孩 我承认
[02:57.38]我说了谎话
[02:58.68]我要离你而去 不再回心转意
[03:01.97]也许只有酒精和夜雨可以让我暂时麻痹
[03:04.58]
[03:05.18]但无论我走到哪里 脑海里满满全是你
[03:07.81]
[03:08.34]我多想拨通你的电话 倾诉我的一切想法
[03:11.93]
[03:13.01]但我拨打的仍是一串空号
[03:16.05]
[03:18.14]一串空号
[03:23.06]
[03:26.45]我拨打的仍是一串空号
